personal.name: Maheshwor Tiwari
personal.title: Data Analyst | AI Engineer
personal.tagline: From Quantum Physics to Data Science: Turning Complex Data into Actionable Business Insights

about.short: PhD-trained Data Analyst with 2+ years transforming complex data into strategic business insights. Specializing in Python automation, SQL optimization, and interactive dashboards across property, healthcare, and construction sectors.
valueProps: 2+ years building data pipelines, dashboards, and ML models that reduce costs 30% and improve accuracy to 99%
PhD-level analytical rigor applied to practical business challenges: From quantum mechanics to business intelligence
Full-stack data professional: Python/SQL → ETL pipelines → Tableau/Power BI → Stakeholder presentations

achievements: Designed Python ML models for predictive analytics, enabling data-driven decisions that improved forecasting accuracy by 25%
Built automated data pipelines that improved efficiency by 30%, reducing manual processing time from 8 hours to 5.6 hours weekly
Developed interactive dashboards using Matplotlib and Seaborn, improving stakeholder engagement and decision-making speed
Automated data extraction for population datasets using Python, improving accuracy by 20% and team collaboration
Built Power BI dashboards that reduced client reporting time by 30%, from 10 hours to 7 hours per week
Optimized customer support response times through data analysis, improving operational efficiency by 15%
Built Python scripts tracking KPIs with 99% accuracy, ensuring data integrity across 50,000+ records
Enhanced analytics capabilities by 25% through Python optimization, reducing query execution time
Created Tableau dashboards that improved decision-making processes, leading to 10% cost reduction
4 years of advanced Python programming for computational modeling and complex data analysis
Published peer-reviewed research on quantum spin systems, demonstrating deep analytical capabilities
Managed large datasets and presented findings at international conferences, honing communication skills
